com.jidesoft.document
Interface DocumentComponentListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
DocumentComponentAdapter
public interface DocumentComponentListener
extends java.util.EventListener

The listener interface for receiving document pane events.

Method Summary
 void documentComponentActivated(DocumentComponentEvent e)
          Invoked when a document is activated.

          Invoked when a document has been closed.

          Invoked when a document is in the process of being closed.

          Invoked when a document is de-activated.
 void documentComponentOpened(DocumentComponentEvent e)
          Invoked when a document has been opened.

documentComponentClosing

public void documentComponentClosing(DocumentComponentEvent e)
Invoked when a document is in the process of being closed. The close operation can be overridden at this point. If you don't want the document to be closed, just setAllowClosing(false)

Parameters:
e - event
